text: Dr. Karl Kurt Wolter (23 March 1905 – 7 December 1988)Background notes on The Roll of Distinguished Philatelists September 2011, Roll of Distinguished Philatelists Trust, London, 2011. Archived here. was a German philatelist who was added to the Roll of Distinguished Philatelists in 1976. ==References== Category:Signatories to the Roll of Distinguished Philatelists Category:1905 births Category:1988 deaths Category:German philatelists Category:Fellows of the Royal Philatelic Society London
title: Karl Kurt Wolter
